title: Every Second Counts — Chrome Extension
description: A Chrome extension that replaces your new tab with a live clock, reminding you that every second counts.

title: Be My Valentine
description: An interactive Valentine's Day message generator. Fill in details and share a personalized link with your special someone.

title: Interview Prep
description: A searchable knowledge base for interview preparation with organized topics and sidebar navigation.

title: Every Second Counts — Clock
description: An interactive analog clock with animated hands and an optional ticking sound effect.

title: Vyne
description: A minimal, ready-to-use Next.js starter template with best practices — perfect for quick project setups.

title: Vyre
description: A modern, scalable Next.js frontend starter with SEO-friendly routing, responsive design, and easy extensibility.

title: Daily Quotes
description: Displays a different inspirational quote each day with a matching background image, selected by hashing the current date.

title: C-Sign
description: Android application for verifying user identity using digital signatures and two-factor authentication. Built during internship at CDAC.

title: Sentiment Analysis
description: Final year project analyzing sentiment from text data using machine learning techniques. Classifies text as positive, negative, or neutral.
